title: Is a Yamaha MT-09 too powerful for a beginner? - Quora

response.answer_text: Absolutely. A beginner should probably ride a 250 or so. Learn the fundamentals on a small bike and when it becomes second nature, then graduate to a bigger bike if you want that. My first bike was an 80.
Yes it is You will miss out learning valuable skills from learning on a lower powered motorcycle You have to crawl before you can walk.. Cheers
